summary: SummaryPop & blend encapsulated Salmon DNA PDRN with Medicube's PDRN Pink Collagen Capsule Cream! Brighten and hydrate, targeting uneven tone, dullness, skin firmness and glass-skin radiance.
details: DetailsBenefitsBrightens & reduces spots – Salmon DNA PDRN supports uneven skin tone, enhancing clarity and radiant, glass-like glowBoosts hydration & elasticity – Formulated with collagen and hyaluronic acid, it improves hydration by over 100% immediately and elasticity by 33% within two weeksStrengthens skin barrier – Salmon DNA also bolsters resilience and supports a healthy, reinforced skin barrierFeaturesDual capsule‑gel texture – Innovative encapsulation preserves active Salmon DNA PDRN until skin contact, maximizing brightening, firming and hydrationLightweight, customizable feel – Mixable ratio of capsule and gel lets users tailor hydration level—gel‑forward for lighter feel or capsule‑rich for deeper moistureResearch ResultsImprovement in hydration by 102.4% right after useImprovement in uneven skin tone by 19.4% (After 2 weeks of use)Improvement in pigmentation by 1.5% (After 2 weeks of use)Improvement in skin elasticity by 33% (After 2 weeks of use)*Clinical Trial Tested by 'Global Institute of Dermatological Sciences' / Results may vary depending on individual skin types.Item 2645368How To UseMix the PDRN capsule and transparent gel in a suitable ratio based on your skin type. For a lighter feel, increase the ratio of the gel, while for more hydration and elasticity, increase the ratio of the capsule.Apply the mixture morning and evening to face and neck, after serum.[Ration for skin type] -For oily skin: Transparent gel 2 + PDRN capsule 1For normal & combination skin: Transparent gel 1 + PDRN capsule 1For dry & sensitive skin: For oily skin: Transparent gel 1 + PDRN capsule 2For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Methylpropanediol, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycereth-26, Arginine, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Simethicone, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Polyacrylate-13, Sodium Dna, Disodium Edta, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Polyisobutene, Hydrolyzed Sclerotium Gum, Glyceryl Stearate, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Polysorbate 20, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glutathione, Octyldodecanol, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Salmon Egg Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ceramide Np, Cyanocobalamin, Thioctic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Collagen Extract, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Copper Tripeptide-1, Hyaluronic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Potassium Hyaluronate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Mix the PDRN capsule and transparent gel in a suitable ratio based on your skin type. For a lighter feel, increase the ratio of the gel, while for more hydration and elasticity, increase the ratio of the capsule.Apply the mixture morning and evening to face and neck, after serum.[Ration for skin type] -For oily skin: Transparent gel 2 + PDRN capsule 1For normal & combination skin: Transparent gel 1 + PDRN capsule 1For dry & sensitive skin: For oily skin: Transparent gel 1 + PDRN capsule 2For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.

reviews.headline: This product has been a GameChanger for my skin
reviews.comments: I was so happy to see Ulta carry Medicube. I ordered this serum and the difference in my dry mature skin shocked me. Certain skin care products help but this one I noticed a difference pretty quickly

reviews.headline: Sticky mess but somehow dry
reviews.comments: I have sensitive combination skin. I had such high hopes for this cream, but I was sadly disappointed. I tried every combination possible of pearls to gel and even time my face felt so sticky! Even overnight I woke up and it was still sticky. It also somehow felt dry and tight. it may be good for some people, but it's a no from me.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: I love love love this mousturizer! Worth all the hype.

reviews.headline: Game changer
reviews.comments: Was skeptical because anything with too much hype usually disappoints. But this changed my skin from the first usage. My skin has better bounce and the hydration is insane. Currently in the car on my way to pick up some of the other pieces from this line

reviews.headline: The BEST for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I've tried so many different moisturizers that have either broke me out or made my oily skin worse. This moisturizer works so good with my skin and with my makeup products!

reviews.headline: I love this!
reviews.comments: I break out easily and this stuff is amazing and a great price
